headlines.description: Diogo Jota scored a stoppage time winner to earn Wolves an amazing 4-3 win over Leicester City in one of the best games of the season so far.
headlines.shortLinkText: Jota stars as Wolves win seven-goal thriller

events.name: West Ham United at AFC Bournemouth

headlines.description: Callum Wilson smashed home a wonderful second-half volley to help Bournemouth towards a much-needed win against West Ham.
headlines.shortLinkText: Wilson scores wonder volley as Bournemouth win

headlines.description: Mohamed Salah's two goals helped Liverpool beat Crystal Palace 4-3 to extend their lead at the top of the Premier League table to seven points.
headlines.shortLinkText: Salah brace as Liverpool beat Palace in thriller

events.name: Brighton & Hove Albion at Manchester United

headlines.description: Ole Gunnar Solskjaer extended his winning start at Manchester United to eight games in all competitions as Brighton were beaten 2-1 at Old Trafford.
headlines.shortLinkText: Pogba, Rashford star as Utd extend winning run

headlines.description: Newcastle United moved out of the relegation zone and dropped Cardiff City into it as an unlikely double by Fabian Schar earned them a crucial win.
headlines.shortLinkText: Newcastle out of relegation zone with emphatic win

headlines.description: Southampton earned a crucial 2-1 win over Everton but had to endure a nervy finish as they boosted their battle against relegation.
headlines.shortLinkText: Southampton earn crucial win in relegation battle

headlines.description: Lowly Burnley made it four games unbeaten in the Premier League with a 0-0 draw at seventh-placed Watford on Saturday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Wood denied as Burnley draw at Watford

headlines.description: Arsenal revived their hopes of a top-four finish with a 2-0 win against Chelsea thanks to goals from Alexandre Lacazette and Laurent Koscielny.
headlines.shortLinkText: Arsenal beat Chelsea to revive top four hopes
